name: dinhanhthi.com
description: A personal website for note-taking built based on 11ty engine with high performance.

scripts.clean: npx rimraf _built && npx rimraf _site && npx rimraf _live && npx rimraf .cache && npx rimraf .empty
scripts.re-install: npm run clean && npx rimraf ./node_modules && npx rimraf ./package-lock.json && npm i
scripts.build-netlify: npm run js:build && npm run css:build && npm run css:prefix && ELEVENTY_ENV=netlify eleventy
scripts.build: npx rimraf -rf _site && npm run js:build && npm run css:build && npm run css:prefix && eleventy && mkdir -p _live && npx rimraf -rf _live/* && cp -Rf _site/* _live/
scripts.build-local: npx rimraf -rf _built && npm run js:build && npm run css:build && npm run css:prefix && ELEVENTY_ENV=full-no-opt eleventy
scripts.preprod: npm run build && npm run full:http-serve-opt
scripts.theming: concurrently "npm run css:watch-local" "npm run theming:serve-watch" "npm run js:build-watch" -c green,blue,red -n css,11ty,js
scripts.full:watch-no-opt: concurrently "npm run css:watch-local" "npm run full:serve-no-opt" "npm run js:build-watch" -c green,blue,red -n css,11ty,js
scripts.css:watch-local: npx rimraf src/css/main.css && npm run css:build && node-sass -w --source-comments src/css/main.scss src/css/main.css
scripts.site:build-update: npm run build && npm run site:update-local
scripts.ud-fontello: npx rimraf .fontello-session && fontello-cli --config src/fontello/config.json --css src/fontello/css --font src/fontello/font install
